title: Health care: unified health care financing.
subject: Healthcare
unifiedhealthcarefinancing

abstracts.abstract:
Existing law requires the Secretary of the California Health and Human Services Agency to research, develop, and pursue discussions of a waiver framework in consultation with the federal government with the objective of a health care system that incorporates specified features and objectives, including, among others, unified financing and a comprehensive package of medical, behavioral health, pharmaceutical, dental, and vision benefits, and the absence of cost sharing for essential services and treatments. Existing law makes related findings and declarations. 

This bill would make a technical, nonsubstantive change to those findings and declarations.

extras.impact_clause: An act to amend Section 1000 of the Health and Safety Code, relating to health care.
